channel.title: Error while building Whonix VirtualBox image
channel.description: I'm trying to build Whonix-Gateway CLI VirtualBox image by command `sudo ~/Whonix/whonix_build --flavor whonix-gateway-cli --target virtualbox --arch i386 --build >> ~/build.log 2>&1`. I've following error while I try to build image: http://sprunge.us/b1oUXj. What I do wrong?

item.title: Error while building Whonix VirtualBox image
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
2 of the scanners showing it as malicious url:

https://www.virustotal.com/#/url/ddaf18b305d446a8e5d28bdf615cb328e38d66b6b57c1ac5ce5acb31353c460f/detection

maybe explaining why its not working.

Read full topic
item.source: Error while building Whonix VirtualBox image

item.title: Error while building Whonix VirtualBox image
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
That paste link does not work.

But I have an idea why it might not work. Whonix 15 builds? See:

Whonix 15 development Development
Whonix 15 VIrtualBox builds currently broken since VirtualBox was removed from Debian buster. Will probably be re-added in buster-backports. Workaround until fix [1] gets developed: Add virtualbox packages to whonix_build_script_skip_package_install Whonix build script variable or by manually continuing on VirtualBox guest additions package installation. [1] The fix will be: Re-add the source code similar like in Whonix 14 build process: download from wherever available (buster-backports in f…

Read full topic
item.source: Error while building Whonix VirtualBox image

item.title: Error while building Whonix VirtualBox image
item.dc:creator: ztaq
item.description:
I’m trying to build Whonix-Gateway CLI VirtualBox image by command sudo ~/Whonix/whonix_build --flavor whonix-gateway-cli --target virtualbox --arch i386 --build >> ~/build.log 2>&1. I’ve following error while I try to build image: http://sprunge.us/b1oUXj. What I do wrong?

Read full topic
item.source: Error while building Whonix VirtualBox image
